cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's suku

sentence.kanji: レストランは空いていました。
sentence.romaji: resutoran ha suite imashita
sentence.english: The restaurant was empty.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sagasu

sentence.kanji: 彼は郵便局を探していました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha yuubinkyoku wo sagashite imashita
sentence.english: He was looking for the post office.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's aku

sentence.kanji: 後ろの席が空いています。
sentence.romaji: ushiro no seki ga aite imasu
sentence.english: The rear seat is empty.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oriru

sentence.kanji: 次の駅で降ります。
sentence.romaji: tsugi no eki de orimasu。
sentence.english: I get off at the next station.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sora

sentence.kanji: 空が真っ青です。
sentence.romaji: sora ga masao desu
sentence.english: The sky is bright blue.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nikai

sentence.kanji: 兄は二階にいます。
sentence.romaji: ani ha nikai ni imasu
sentence.english: My elder brother is on the second floor.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's orosu

sentence.kanji: 彼は車から荷物を降ろした。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kuruma kara nimotsu wo oroshita
sentence.english: He unloaded the luggage from the car.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's karate

sentence.kanji: 彼は空手を習っています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha karate wo narate imasu
sentence.english: He's learning karate.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nyuuin

sentence.kanji: 昨日、母が入院しました。
sentence.romaji: kinou haha ga nyuuin shimashita
sentence.english: My mother was hospitalized yesterday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kokusai

sentence.kanji: ここで国際会議が開かれます。
sentence.romaji: koko de kokusai kaigi ga hirakaremasu
sentence.english: An international conference is going to be held here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's daigakuin

sentence.kanji: 彼は大学院に進みました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha daigakuin ni susumimashita
sentence.english: He's gone on to graduate school.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fukai

sentence.kanji: あの池はとても深い。

sentence.english: That pond is very deep.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fukasa

sentence.kanji: このプールの深さは2メートルです。
sentence.romaji: kono pu-ru no fukasa ha nime-toru desu
sentence.english: This pool is two meters deep.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koshou

sentence.kanji: 冷蔵庫が故障しました。
sentence.romaji: reizouko ga koshou shimashita
sentence.english: The refrigerator broke down.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kenkyuu

sentence.kanji: 彼は何年も地震の研究をしている。
sentence.romaji: kare ha nannen mo jishin no kenkyuu wo shite iru
sentence.english: He's been researching earthquakes for many years.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tonari

sentence.kanji: 隣の家には犬がいます。

sentence.english: They have a dog next door.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's furu

sentence.kanji: 激しい雨が降っています。

cards.english: hit against, come to the end of
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsukiataru

sentence.english: Please turn right when the street ends.

sentence.kanji: この先は突き当たりです。
sentence.romaji: kono saki ha tsukiatari desu
sentence.english: There's a T-intersection ahead.

sentence.romaji: shoubousha ga yondai mo kita
sentence.english: Four fire engines came.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's biyouin

sentence.english: My father has his hair cut at a hair salon.

sentence.english: The sun hid behind the clouds.

sentence.kanji: 太陽が雲に隠れた。
sentence.romaji: taiyou ga kumo ni kakureta
sentence.english: The sun hid behind the clouds.

sentence.english: You finished really early, didn't you?

sentence.english: There's only one fire station in this town.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ana

sentence.english: The two of us looked up at the night sky.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's aki

sentence.english: Are there any vacant rooms?

sentence.english: We couldn't see the moon because of the rain.

sentence.english: Construction started in the vacant lot.

sentence.english: Please call me in the evening.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kokusaiteki

sentence.english: She is an internationally famous singer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kokusaika

sentence.english: This university has internationalized.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kousai

sentence.english: He was going out with a model.

sentence.english: It's a good opportunity to speak frankly.

sentence.kanji: 彼は空想にふけっているの。

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hoshou

sentence.english: She deepend her understanding of different cultures.

cards.english: adjoin, be next door to each other
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tonariau

sentence.english: This town lies between the sea and the mountain.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fukamaru

sentence.kanji: 二人の愛はますます深まっているね。
sentence.romaji: futari no ai ha masumasu fukamateiru ne
sentence.english: Their love has become deeper and deeper.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's totsuzen

sentence.kanji: 彼は突然走り出したのよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha totsuzen hashiridashita no yo
sentence.english: He suddenly began to run.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuku

sentence.english: He shoots pool very well.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuitotsu

sentence.english: The bus bumped the passenger car from behind.

sentence.english: He entered the military.

sentence.english: There was an airplane crash.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's heiki

sentence.english: That country has strong weapons.

sentence.english: The soldier was holding the gun at the ready.

sentence.english: Three soldiers were injured in the bombing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's boushi

sentence.english: There was a fire drill at school.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sunahama

sentence.english: I strolled on the beach early in the morning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hama

sentence.english: There's going to be a fireworks show at the beach tonight.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsukomu

sentence.english: I thrust my wallet into my pocket.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hikaeru

sentence.english: I'm refraining from eating sweets these days.

sentence.romaji: koko ha okyakusama you no hikaeshitsu desu 。
sentence.english: This is a waiting room for guests.

sentence.english: Please stretch well to prevent injuries.

sentence.english: I picked up a beautiful shell on the beach.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oka

sentence.romaji: oka no ue ni hoteru ga tachimashita ne
sentence.english: A hotel was built on top of the hill.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shoubou

sentence.english: Fire fighters must be brave.

sentence.english: The cat tore the paper sliding door.
